duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide a range of Assurance services and business advice to clients from small, fast growing clients to large entities.
Use the latest technology to reduce manual testing and focus on valuable areas of client service and enhancing corporate governance and reliability of clients’ information.
Work as part of a team of problem solvers, helping to solve complex business issues from strategy to execution.
Coach others, recognize their strengths, and encourage them to take ownership of their personal development.
Develop a point of view on key global trends, and how they impact clients.
Use data and insights to inform conclusions and support decision-making.
Maintain a fresh perspective on global and cross-cultural issues, and sow cultural dexterity by modifying behavior to the environment.

Innovate through new and existing technologies, experiment with digitization solutions, work with large, complex data sets to build models and leverage data visualization tools to provide insights to clients.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor Degree in Accounting (CPA License required); International hires are required to hold the equivalent accounting certification in the selected individual's home country.
CPA license in work office state (preferred)
